channel.title: research on juliambrown
channel.description: Recent content in research on juliambrown

item.title: Research
item.description: When you step into the ocean on planet Earth, you are stepping into an ocean of viruses. Roughly 50 million viruses are suspended within every teaspoon of seawater. The vast majority of these viruses infect microscopic organisms. Their complex relationship with hosts, ecosystems and biogeochemistry make them one of the least understood components of environments around the globe. The image at the top of this page is a microscopy slide created from half a teaspoon of seawater.
